comment: This class isn't too hard. There are a couple of things that require you to do quite a bit of work, but he gives great feedback on them. His lectures are good and he doesn't make them too long. He is very easy going and easy to talk to if you have any questions.

He's very easygoing and gives great instruction throughout labs! For difficult math sections, he walked through it with us and made sure we were prepared for every practicum and the final. He talks just enough to get the info you need, but he never takes more class time than necessary. Highly recommend!
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He's very nice, chill dude. Explains the lab procedures very well, nothing too crazy.
He is nice and jokes around with students. He was pretty chill, nothing super crazy.
He was a great professor. He ensured that you understood the material and always assisted you if needed. Great professor!

Swade is honestly a great professor. I had him for lab and it was his first year doing this and he did great. He is very caring and knows what he is talking about. Weekly quizzes based on the lab you are about to do, they are very easy. Grades very nicely, just show up to class.
